jexer

Class TImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.TImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>, EditMenuUser

    public class TImage
extends TWidget
implements EditMenuUser
    TImage renders a piece of a bitmap image or an animated image on screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TImage.Scale
      Selections for fitting the image to the text cells.

      • TImage

        public TImage(TWidget parent,
              int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              BufferedImage image,
              int left,
              int top)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent widget
        x - column relative to parent
        y - row relative to parent
        width - number of text cells for width of the image
        height - number of text cells for height of the image
        image - the image to display
        left - left column of the image. 0 is the left-most column.
        top - top row of the image. 0 is the top-most row.
